text: @DrRPNishank @narendramodi @AmitShah @PMOIndia @HMOIndia @HRDMinistry @mygovindia @transformIndia @PIB_India @MIB_India @DDNewslive #FitIndiaTalks sir will u postpone jee as being a dropper I can't take a chance of being infected by covid-19 but exam are important too so pls postpone jee as it was not possible to conduct boards how it can be possible to conduct JEE
